name: Maximizing Your Leadership Potential
desc: Maximizing Your Leadership Potential is a feedback-rich development experience designed to immerse participants in different roles and mindsets of managing people and projects: team player, coach, manager, and leader. Live sessions are 4 hours per day over 5 consecutive days.
who_attend_desc: Our programs are focused on providing tailored insights into your unique leadership style and abilities.

name: Assessment Certification
desc: CCL’s Assessment Certification Course is a self-paced training with 10 hours (on average) of expert feedback facilitation content. The course provides the opportunity to prepare two feedback reports in a safe, low-risk environment, which will be reviewed by a Course Monitor. Participants who complete the Assessment Certification course and pass the certification exam can administer the leadership assessments in our portfolio: Benchmarks® by Design™, Benchmarks® for Managers™, Benchmarks® for Executives™, Benchmarks® for Learning Agility™, and Skillscope® — all of which include CCL Compass™, a digital tool that gathers your assessment data, interprets it, and recommends what to do next.
who_attend_desc: Our programs are focused on providing tailored insights into your unique leadership style and abilities.

overview.desc: CCL’s Assessment Certification Course is a self-paced training with 10 hours (on average) of expert feedback facilitation content. The course provides the opportunity to prepare two feedback reports in a safe, low-risk environment, which will be reviewed by a Course Monitor. Participants who complete the Assessment Certification course and pass the certification exam can administer the leadership assessments in our portfolio: Benchmarks® by Design™, Benchmarks® for Managers™, Benchmarks® for Executives™, Benchmarks® for Learning Agility™, and Skillscope® — all of which include CCL Compass™, a digital tool that gathers your assessment data, interprets it, and recommends what to do next.

name: Better Conversations & Coaching
desc: Better Conversations & Coaching Level 1 is a coaching skills program that gives leaders at all levels and functions the skills and confidence needed to drive performance, enhance engagement, and contribute more to their team by fostering better conversations and practicing formal coaching. * CCL–North America programs begin at 1:00 p.m. Eastern Standard Time (EST) each day. * CCL–Europe programs begin at 9:00 a.m. Central European Time (CET) each day. By working in small groups led by a dedicated mentor, participants develop a personal communication and coaching style that works for them and their teams.
who_attend_desc: Our programs are focused on providing tailored insights into your unique leadership style and abilities.

overview.desc: Better Conversations & Coaching Level 1 is a coaching skills program that gives leaders at all levels and functions the skills and confidence needed to drive performance, enhance engagement, and contribute more to their team by fostering better conversations and practicing formal coaching. * CCL–North America programs begin at 1:00 p.m. Eastern Standard Time (EST) each day. * CCL–Europe programs begin at 9:00 a.m. Central European Time (CET) each day. By working in small groups led by a dedicated mentor, participants develop a personal communication and coaching style that works for them and their teams.

name: The Leading Strategically Experience
desc: Over the course of 2 weeks, participants engage in live online learning sessions and a high-impact business simulation, all while working with a current strategic leadership challenge aimed at reinforcing immediate learning application. Additionally, participants will complete online, asynchronous learning content delivered via CCL's Leadership Accelerator platform. * Business simulation * 90-minute one-one executive coaching session * Business simulation outcome and presentation * Peer consulting Highlights:
who_attend_desc: Our programs are focused on providing tailored insights into your unique leadership style and abilities.

overview.desc: Over the course of 2 weeks, participants engage in live online learning sessions and a high-impact business simulation, all while working with a current strategic leadership challenge aimed at reinforcing immediate learning application. Additionally, participants will complete online, asynchronous learning content delivered via CCL's Leadership Accelerator platform. * Business simulation * 90-minute one-one executive coaching session * Business simulation outcome and presentation * Peer consulting Highlights:

name: Leading for Organizational Impact
desc: Leading for Organizational Impact: The Looking Glass Experience is an executive leadership training that provides insight into leading within an organization through a comprehensive, global, day-in-the-life business simulation. Delivered by highly qualified faculty and coaches, the program enhances the ability to lead a function or division while balancing short-term and long-term strategic perspectives.
who_attend_desc: Our programs are focused on providing tailored insights into your unique leadership style and abilities.

overview.desc: Leading for Organizational Impact: The Looking Glass Experience is an executive leadership training that provides insight into leading within an organization through a comprehensive, global, day-in-the-life business simulation. Delivered by highly qualified faculty and coaches, the program enhances the ability to lead a function or division while balancing short-term and long-term strategic perspectives.

name: Leadership at the Peak
desc: Leadership at the Peak is a once-in-a-career opportunity to maximize personal leadership power to accelerate organizational commitment, alignment, and results. Delivered by highly qualified faculty and coaches, Leadership at the Peak is dedicated to helping executives in the C-suite or on the senior executive team address the unique challenges experienced by those at the top of the organization. This leadership development experience allows top executives to reflect on their leadership style, dissect their effectiveness, and examine how to proceed.
who_attend_desc: Our programs are focused on providing tailored insights into your unique leadership style and abilities.

overview.desc: Leadership at the Peak is a once-in-a-career opportunity to maximize personal leadership power to accelerate organizational commitment, alignment, and results. Delivered by highly qualified faculty and coaches, Leadership at the Peak is dedicated to helping executives in the C-suite or on the senior executive team address the unique challenges experienced by those at the top of the organization. This leadership development experience allows top executives to reflect on their leadership style, dissect their effectiveness, and examine how to proceed.

name: Leadership Development Program (LDP)®
desc: The Leadership Development Program (LDP)® is designed for leaders of managers, and focuses on the 6 key skills needed for mid-level leaders: * Influence * Communication * Thinking and acting systemically * Self-awareness * Learning agility * Resilience * * , participants work independently to prepare for their live intensive experience by completing * to the live intensive session, the LDP Host who will support participants online throughout their journey will host a * . * * (agenda above). For an optimal experience, participants are expected to fully engage in the live online intensive experience and are encouraged to utilize an out-of-office auto-response to maximize learning and engagement. * * , application of learning continues through Leadership Micro-Challenges, a live hosted peer group reconnect, 2 one-to-one coaching sessions, CCL Compass, Reflections 360 survey, and induction into the CCL Connect alumni community. * * , participants work independently to prepare for their live intensive experience by completing * pre-work including assessments. * * (agenda above). For an optimal experience, participants are encouraged to fully engage in the face-to-face intensive experience and to utilize an out-of-office auto-response to maximize learning and engagement. * * , application of learning continues through 2 one-to-one coaching sessions, CCL Compass, Reflections 360 survey, and induction into the CCL Connect alumni community. This leadership development program provides a highly personal experience that is tailored to help each leader maximize results by providing a safe environment for learning and skill practice. LDP helps mid- to senior-level leaders clarify challenges and strengthen their ability to get the results that matter.
who_attend_desc: Our programs are focused on providing tailored insights into your unique leadership style and abilities.

name: Frontline Leader Impact
desc: This online leadership program is designed to transform frontline managers into leaders by developing these 6 critical skills for success: * Self-Awareness * Learning Agility * Communication * Political Savvy * Motivating Others * Influencing Outcomes Participants will have an action plan to take back to their organization to implement — achieving real benefit and impact on the organization.
who_attend_desc: Our programs are focused on providing tailored insights into your unique leadership style and abilities.

overview.desc: This online leadership program is designed to transform frontline managers into leaders by developing these 6 critical skills for success: * Self-Awareness * Learning Agility * Communication * Political Savvy * Motivating Others * Influencing Outcomes Participants will have an action plan to take back to their organization to implement — achieving real benefit and impact on the organization.

name: Lead 4 Success™
desc: Lead 4 Success® develops the 4 fundamental skills that leaders at every level need to master: * Self-awareness * Learning agility * Influence * Communication Immersed in experiential learning, leaders adapt the foundational skills to their own leadership contexts and apply the lessons to their real world leadership challenges.
who_attend_desc: Our programs are focused on providing tailored insights into your unique leadership style and abilities.

overview.desc: Lead 4 Success® develops the 4 fundamental skills that leaders at every level need to master: * Self-awareness * Learning agility * Influence * Communication Immersed in experiential learning, leaders adapt the foundational skills to their own leadership contexts and apply the lessons to their real world leadership challenges.

name: CCL Boost™ for New Leaders
desc: CCL Boost™ for New Leaders is a self-paced, online leadership course based on the deep research completed by the Center for Creative Leadership on first-time managers. This online program equips new managers with the leadership skills, confidence, and support needed to effectively transition into a management role. It provides 6 mindset shifts that new managers can use while on the job to attain immediate success in their new role. Learners will traverse the 6 essential shifts through a variety of methods, including expert videos, video case studies, thought-provoking reflection exercises, and practice and reflection assignments. Leaders take away downloadable resources, practical tools, and actionable tips to apply immediately in their role.
who_attend_desc: Our programs are focused on providing tailored insights into your unique leadership style and abilities.

LDP helps mid- to senior-level leaders clarify challenges and strengthen their ability to get the results that matter.

name: The Effective Leader
desc: In this program, managers will learn how to lead virtual teams, techniques to increase resiliency, a comprehensive understanding of their strengths and development opportunities as a leader, and skills for solving complex challenges. Participants will be guided through this interactive experience by CCL’s top faculty, working closely with them and in small groups of peers throughout the course.
who_attend_desc: Our programs are focused on providing tailored insights into your unique leadership style and abilities.

overview.desc: In this program, managers will learn how to lead virtual teams, techniques to increase resiliency, a comprehensive understanding of their strengths and development opportunities as a leader, and skills for solving complex challenges. Participants will be guided through this interactive experience by CCL’s top faculty, working closely with them and in small groups of peers throughout the course.

name: Leadership at the Peak
desc: Leadership at the Peak is a once-in-a-career opportunity to maximize personal leadership power to accelerate organizational commitment, alignment, and results. Delivered by highly qualified faculty and coaches, Leadership at the Peak is dedicated to helping executives in the C-suite or on the senior executive team address the unique challenges experienced by those at the top of the organization. This leadership development experience allows top executives to reflect on their leadership style, dissect their effectiveness, and examine how to proceed.
who_attend_desc: Our programs are focused on providing tailored insights into your unique leadership style and abilities.

name: Leading for Organizational Impact
desc: Leading for Organizational Impact: The Looking Glass Experience is an executive leadership training that provides insight into leading within an organization through a comprehensive, global, day-in-the-life business simulation. Delivered by highly qualified faculty and coaches, the program enhances the ability to lead a function or division while balancing short-term and long-term strategic perspectives.
who_attend_desc: Our programs are focused on providing tailored insights into your unique leadership style and abilities.

name: The Leading Strategically Experience
desc: Over the course of 2 weeks, participants engage in live online learning sessions and a high-impact business simulation, all while working with a current strategic leadership challenge aimed at reinforcing immediate learning application. Additionally, participants will complete online, asynchronous learning content delivered via CCL's Leadership Accelerator platform. * Business simulation * 90-minute one-one executive coaching session * Business simulation outcome and presentation * Peer consulting Highlights:
who_attend_desc: Our programs are focused on providing tailored insights into your unique leadership style and abilities.

overview.desc: Over the course of 2 weeks, participants engage in live online learning sessions and a high-impact business simulation, all while working with a current strategic leadership challenge aimed at reinforcing immediate learning application. Additionally, participants will complete online, asynchronous learning content delivered via CCL's Leadership Accelerator platform. * Business simulation * 90-minute one-one executive coaching session * Business simulation outcome and presentation * Peer consulting Highlights:

name: Better Conversations Every Day™
desc: Working in virtual groups of 4, each led by an experienced, certified executive coach, participants will experience: * Best practices for building trust * Effective conversations * Achieving results in a virtual environment * In-depth discussion and practice This small group approach ensures active participation and engagement throughout the course, resulting in the fastest learning possible.
who_attend_desc: Our programs are focused on providing tailored insights into your unique leadership style and abilities.
